title: MS increase
body: Two friends and I are getting approximately double MS all of a sudden. Our internets is otherwise completely fine. Anyone else getting this?

replies.body: Yep. Its happening all over NZ atm :(
some people from aus seem to have it too
Happening to me and a mate too we went from 35ms to around 200ms since after todays patch.
Is the OCE technical support gone home early for waitangi day?
same issue i usually have 57. but chilling at constant 211 now. my adc had same high ping, and most of my friends have the issue as well. all from nz

Why is there not even a update on the status of this no communication at all from riot feels like oce is very low priority your going to have alot of pissed off people if its still high ping tomorrow on the public holiday. I'm sitting on 130ping normally 40 and friends are close to 200 ping
im still sitting on 200 when i should be under 50ms
No response from Riot for this? Shouldn't it be a priority?
Do you still have the problem?
seems to be fixed now
Happening to me went from 45 to 199

There is flooding in Tauranga rn and spark has opened up their public wifi spots to everyone instead of paying customers so they can stay in contact with their family. Expect throttling until the flooding ceases as spark and telstra run the fibre line which goes from AU To NZ.
Source (Spark website) this has also happened before with the fibre line
But why is it just affecting league of legends and not other games or like, youtube and stuff?

It should be fixed now. 
It was affecting almost everything, It doesn't affect p2p games or "stuff like youtube"because they don't used the fibre cable that goes from nz to au they have their own hosted servers or they are player hosted(p2p) games
It's actually getting progressively worse for me. NZ. It started off as about double ms now i'm almost triple.
Some multi million $ game. . . good job riot.
Are you guys with spark? I am having the same issue
Ping a sitting around 150ms when its normally 65ish

YES same here. I'm in Wellington. Patch updated and since then first 3 games have had 125 ping for no reason whatsoever. Usually my ping is between 40-48. 
It's still playable but a little sluggish, and a little tilting. Might just play WoW for now.
From 60 constant to 210 constant
still no reply from riot about this crap
So much lag atm. Usually on 30 ish ping or under. sitting at 198 ping
double movement speed hax
Still happening, half my team including me were out of the game from the get go with 300 ping.

Could be a separate issue or could be a resurgence of the same. The issue was on the ISP end (as I understand it there was maintenance on the main fibre line from NZ to AU). Being an ISP issue though there's nothing that Riot can actually do other than reroute traffic, but as far as I know from NZ to AUS there aren't that many options for rerouting large amounts of traffic.

tl;dr - If you're still experiencing this issue, check your ISPs website for any notifications. If you know what ISP runs your ISPs physical lines, check them too.

120 ping for me, about 4 other people in my game were experiencing it also, dont see anything about it on service status or red tracker idk. feelsbadman

copy paste from other threads zzz
